title: Modeling Non-Uniform Hypergraphs Using Determinantal Point Processes
summary: This paper proposes a new hypergraph model using Determinantal Point Processes (DPPs) to address the limitations of existing models that assume uniform hyperedges or rely on node diversity. It focuses on modeling higher-order interactions among multiple nodes in real-world networks.
usefulness_reason: The title explicitly mentions "Determinantal Point Processes", which is a direct and strong match for "Point Process". The modeling of "higher-order interactions" in networks can have spatio-temporal implications, although not explicitly stated.
